subject: Fashion
title: The Divided Skirt Controversy
description: One-minute skill: The Divided Skirt Controversy.

hook.text: In 1893, women who rode bicycles faced a crisis: long skirts got caught in the wheels.

buildup.text: Some women tried a 'divided skirt'â€”a garment split down the middle that looked like wide trousers.

discovery.text: Newspapers ran editorials calling the style indecent. Women wearing them were harassed on the street.

twist.text: Lady Harberton was refused entry to a hotel dining room in 1898 for wearing one. She suedâ€”and lost.

climax.text: The bicycle forced the issue. Women needed practical clothing, and no law could stop a moving wheel.

punchline.text: A bicycle did more for women's dress than any designer.

quiz.question: What drove the adoption of divided skirts in the 1890s?
options: A royal decree allowed women to wear trousers
Fashion designers launched a campaign for women's liberation
The bicycle craze made long skirts dangerous and impractical
